summary: Grayson from Infinity Blade iphone game
descriptionHtml:
Uploaded version with both 1h and 2h craftable ingame. 1h is wieldable in either hand.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This here is the the Grayson from the Infinity Blade Game. It is craftable under daedric category and is slightly better than daedric greatsword. Many people complain about unrrealistically sized fancy anime weapons so I decided to make this since it looks kinda nordic. So far 2h version only. Will upload 1h version later. 


My mods:
Hidans Scythe - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16401
Infinity Blade - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17255
Legion Helmet - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18341
Phoenix Katana - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16935
Stormfang Blade - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18494
Grayson Sword - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17552
Zabuzas Executioner Blade - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16753
author: siberok92
